## Overview

The goal for this set of resource pages is supporting a face-to-face workshop offered via the [Data & Visualization Services] Department of the Duke University Libraries. The primary exercises will help you georeference locations make a  [choropleth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Choropleth_map) with census data.

During the Workshop we introduce

- Choropleth
- Polygons (shapes)
- Census Geography
- Briefly Introduce ACS and decennial census 

    - Census API Key 

## Workshop Resource Page

1. [Georeferencing](01_georeference.html):  Plotting XY latitude & longitude

1. [Choropleths with tidycensus](02_choropleth.html)

1. Thematic Mapping with [Simple Features](030_thematic_sf.html), plus saving map images and files
